title: ISic030134. ISic030134
body:
Facsimile Images

|a 1ΖΟ̄ΙΛΟΣΠΟΛΕΜΑΡΧΟ̄ |b
2ΔΥΟ̄ΔΕΚΑΤΑΣ´ΦΑΤΡΑΣ

Apparatus criticus

Text after Arena (IGASM II)

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

This document is one of a large deposit (c. 150) of lead tesserae found in a storeroom of Athena's sanctuary at the archaeological site of Kamarina. On the face a, in the lower part, there are traces of a previous use that are no longer legible.

bibliography

  • Arena 2002 126.16 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001373
  • Cordano 1992 65 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002437
  • Cordano 1989[1991] ... https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002438
  • 41.0793 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
